page.title: 11A Day in the Life of.....(1)
page.content: CRAIG DEACON aged 9. I usually wake at 6.30a.m. when Mum is still asleep.I wake Mum up and tell her I am going to the River Dove with Andrew.I have my breakfast first,a drink of milk and some cereal.When we reach the little waterfall,(measuring 1 metre across and 1 metre down),we cross the river to Holmes Island next to the weir.Our base is a ditch in the ground with sticks and leaves covering it.At about twelve o'clock I go for dinner,sometimes it's chips and fish fingers,then I go back to Holmes Island with Dad and my sister.When Clare has fished falling in we all go home for tea.My favourite is beef-burgers.I think I go to bed about 8 o'clock after I have watched some television.
